title: Karen Carpenter
summary: Karen Anne Carpenter (March 2, 1950 â€“ February 4, 1983) was an American singer and drummer who, along with her elder brother Richard, was part of the duo the Carpenters. With a distinctive three-octave contralto vocal range, she was praised by her peers as one of the greatest singers ever.[1][2][3][4] Her struggle with and eventual death from anorexia would later raise awareness of eating disorders and body dysmorphia.
